meanings.definition: A bone of the pectoral girdle, which connects the arm to the trunk of the body.
meanings.sent1: The clavicle helps connect the arm to the body.
meanings.sent2: She felt pain in her clavicle after the fall.
meanings.sent3: The clavicle decided to take a break from connecting the arm and the body.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as strong as a clavicle holding the arm in place.
meanings.sent5: The clavicle, like a bridge, supports the arm's connection to the body.
